data.title: Law Schools Attended by Attorney General's Honors Program and Summer Law Intern Program Hires
data.text:
Incoming 2024 Honors Program attorneys and 2024 Summer Law Interns hired through the fall 2023 recruitment cycle attended the following law schools:

ALABAMA

The University of Alabama School of Law

ARIZONA

CALIFORNIA

California Western School of Law
